| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Bug fix?      | Yes or No
| New feature?  | Yes or No
| BC breaks?    | Yes or No
| Deprecations? | Yes or No
| Fixed tickets | N/A or xx

> Do not forget to add notes about your changes to CHANGELOG.md
>
> Easiest way to do it, by running next command:
>
>     php bin/changelog
